allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add Mubarak Club neobrutalist personal website

Created a creative neobrutalist personal webpage for economics education with three versions:
- English version (index.html)
- Arabic version with RTL support (index-ar.html)
- Bilingual version with creative language switcher (index-bilingual.html)

Features:
- Bold neobrutalist design with thick borders and vibrant colors
- Smooth scroll animations and transitions
- Responsive layout for all devices
- Video tutorials section for YouTube content
- Blog section for economics articles
- Contact form and resources section
- Creative fixed language switcher with Arabic as default

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

- resources.html: Downloadable study materials and practice tests
